source: IL CCB Cannabis Advertising Rules — idfpr.illinois.gov
notes: IL Cannabis Regulation and Tax Act (410 ILCS 705) prohibits therapeutic claims and requires 21+ audience targeting.

rules.description: Medical claim: IL CRTA §55-21 prohibits advertising that states or implies cannabis has therapeutic or medical value.
False safety claim: IL CCB prohibits statements implying cannabis is safer or healthier than other substances without substantiation.
Prescription language prohibited under IL CRTA advertising rules.
Clinical claim prohibited by IL CCB §55-21.
Medical professional endorsement prohibited under IL CRTA advertising rules.
Appeal to minors: IL CRTA §55-21(a)(4) explicitly prohibits marketing that could be appealing to persons under 21.
